text: Hauya elegans is a species of flowering plant in the Onagraceae family. It is native to Oaxaca and Chiapas, Mexico to Honduras, Costa Rica, and Guatemala. ==References== ==External links== * * elegans Category:Plants described in 1828 Category:Flora of Mexico Category:Taxa named by Martín Sessé y Lacasta Category:Taxa named by Alphonse Pyramus de Candolle Category:Taxa named by José Mariano Mociño
title: Hauya elegans
